verses.verse: Why standest <S%H5975><s%> <S%H8799><s%> thou afar off <S%H7350><s%>, O YY <S%H3068><s%>? why hidest <S%H5956><s%> <S%H8686><s%> thou thyself in times <S%H6256><s%> of trouble <S%H6869><s%> ?

The wicked <S%H7563><s%> in his pride <S%H1346><s%> doth persecute <S%H1814><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the poor <S%H6041><s%>: let them be taken <S%H8610><s%> <S%H8735><s%> in the devices <S%H4209><s%> that <S%H2098><s%> they have imagined <S%H2803><s%> <S%H8804><s%>.

For the wicked <S%H7563><s%> boasteth <S%H1984><s%> <S%H8765><s%> of his heart's <S%H5315><s%> desire <S%H8378><s%>, and blesseht <S%H1288><s%> <S%H8765><s%> the covetous <S%H1214><s%> <S%H8802><s%>, whom the YY <S%H3068><s%> abhorreth <S%H5006><s%> <S%H8765><s%>.

The wicked <S%H7563><s%>, through the pride <S%H1363><s%> of his countenance <S%H639><s%>, will not seek <S%H1875><s%> <S%H8799><s%> after 'Elohim: 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> is not in all his thoughts <S%H4209><s%>.

His ways <S%H1870><s%> are always <S%H6256><s%> grievous <S%H2342><s%> <S%H8799><s%>; thy judgments <S%H4941><s%> are far above <S%H4791><s%> out of his sight: as for all his enemies <S%H6887><s%> <S%H8802><s%>, he puffeth <S%H6315><s%> <S%H8686><s%> at them.
He hath said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%> in his heart <S%H3820><s%>, I shall not be moved <S%H4131><s%> <S%H8735><s%>: for I shall never <S%H1755><s%> <S%H1755><s%> be in adversity <S%H7451><s%>.

His mouth <S%H6310><s%> is full <S%H4390><s%> <S%H8804><s%> of cursing <S%H423><s%> and deceit <S%H4820><s%> and fraud <S%H8496><s%>: under his tongue <S%H3956><s%> is mischief <S%H5999><s%> and vanity <S%H205><s%>.

He sitteth <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8799><s%> in the lurking places <S%H3993><s%> of the villages <S%H2691><s%>: in the secret places <S%H4565><s%> doth he murder <S%H2026><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the innocent <S%H5355><s%>: his eyes <S%H5869><s%> are privily set <S%H6845><s%> <S%H8799><s%> against the poor <S%H2489><s%>.

He lieth in wait <S%H693><s%> <S%H8799><s%> secretly <S%H4565><s%> as a lion <S%H738><s%> in his den <S%H5520><s%>: he lieth in wait <S%H693><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to catch <S%H2414><s%> <S%H8800><s%> the poor <S%H6041><s%>: he doth catch <S%H2414><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the poor <S%H6041><s%>, when he draweth <S%H4900><s%> <S%H8800><s%> him into his net <S%H7568><s%>.

He croucheth <S%H1794><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and humbleth <S%H7817><s%> <S%H8799><s%> himself, that the poor <S%H2426><s%> <S%H8675><s%> <S%H2489><s%> <S%H8676><s%> <S%H2489><s%> may fall <S%H5307><s%> <S%H8804><s%> by his strong ones <S%H6099><s%>.

He hath said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%> in his heart <S%H3820><s%>, 'Elohim <S%H410><s%> hath forgotten <S%H7911><s%> <S%H8804><s%>: he hideth <S%H5641><s%> <S%H8689><s%> his face <S%H6440><s%>; he will never <S%H5331><s%> see <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8804><s%> it.

Arise <S%H6965><s%> <S%H8798><s%>, O YY <S%H3068><s%>; O 'Elohim <S%H410><s%>, lift up <S%H5375><s%> <S%H8798><s%> thine hand <S%H3027><s%>: forget <S%H7911><s%> <S%H8799><s%> not the humble <S%H6035><s%> <S%H8675><s%> <S%H6041><s%>.

Wherefore doth the wicked <S%H7563><s%> contemn <S%H5006><s%> <S%H8765><s%> 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>? he hath said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%> in his heart <S%H3820><s%>, Thou wilt not require <S%H1875><s%> <S%H8799><s%> it.

Thou hast seen <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8804><s%> it; for thou beholdest <S%H5027><s%> <S%H8686><s%> mischief <S%H5999><s%> and spite <S%H3708><s%>, to requite <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8800><s%> it with thy hand <S%H3027><s%>: the poor <S%H2489><s%> committeth <S%H5800><s%> <S%H8799><s%> himself unto thee; thou art the helper <S%H5826><s%> <S%H8802><s%> of the fatherless <S%H3490><s%>.

Break <S%H7665><s%> <S%H8798><s%> thou the arm <S%H2220><s%> of the wicked <S%H7563><s%> and the evil <S%H7451><s%> man: seek out <S%H1875><s%> <S%H8799><s%> his wickedness <S%H7562><s%> till thou find <S%H4672><s%> <S%H8799><s%> none <S%H1077><s%>.
The YY <S%H3068><s%> is King <S%H4428><s%> for ever <S%H5769><s%> and ever <S%H5703><s%>: the heathen <S%H1471><s%> are perished <S%H6><s%> <S%H8804><s%> out of his land <S%H776><s%>.

YY <S%H3068><s%>, thou hast heard <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the desire <S%H8378><s%> of the humble <S%H6035><s%>: thou wilt prepare <S%H3559><s%> <S%H8686><s%> their heart <S%H3820><s%>, thou wilt cause thine ear <S%H241><s%> to hear <S%H7181><s%> <S%H8686><s%>:

To judge <S%H8199><s%> <S%H8800><s%> the fatherless <S%H3490><s%> and the oppressed <S%H1790><s%>, that the man <S%H582><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%> may no more <S%H3254><s%> <S%H8686><s%> oppress <S%H6206><s%> <S%H8800><s%>.
